long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The People and Planet First extension works directly with some of the biggest search engines and e-commerce websites, allowing you to find sustainable and ethical brands and products easily.

After you've downloaded the extension, you can pin it to your browser for easy access.  Then, at any time when browsing Google or shopping on Amazon, you can click on the extension to see matching People and Planet First verified brands and products.

You can shop with confidence knowing that People and Planet First verified businesses prioritize people and planet over private profit.
